userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: C. Philippe de Richbourg's Petition to Col. Edmund Jenings, 1709 Apr 19, Manuscript # 1932.4, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Richbourg, on behalf of the Huguenot inhabitants of Manikantown {sic} Manakin, Goochland County, Virginia, asks the Council of Virginia to call a town meeting so that new elders can be elected in their parish. Signed by J. Lacatre (?), E. Chaplain, A. Vapine, E. Cheneault, and A. Salle.
